item.title: OpenBSD Dedicated Dotfiles
item.author: Author
item.description: OpenBSD as new OS I keep my dotfiles on Github/Gitlab. I had to configure many things so I started a dedicated repository. New Dotfiles I created a new directory dot in my home dir. And cherry picked some of my old dots. I have pushed my new dot directory to Git[hub,lab] as [Awan,Abdullah]/dot respectively. Old Linux dotfiles Linux users still can find my dotfiles on Github and Gitlab.
